name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory. It will be used as the accessory name in HomeKit.

lighthouses.title: Lighthouses
lighthouses.description: An array of Lighthouses to connect to. If not set, all detected lighthouses will be added to HomeKit.

validationMessages.pattern: Lighthouse ID must be "LHB-" followed by 8 hex digits.

scanTimeout.title: Scan Timeout (Seconds)
scanTimeout.description: Number of seconds to search for Lighthouses at startup.

bleTimeout.title: BLE Timeout (Seconds)
bleTimeout.description: Number of seconds to allow for BLE commands.

updateFrequency.title: Update Polling Frequency (Seconds)
updateFrequency.description: Number of seconds between attempts to check status of the Lighthouses.
